Detect secrets in text

Source: R/patterns-secrets.R
detect_secrets.Rd

Scans text for secrets and credentials using regex patterns.

Usage

detect_secrets(text, types = NULL)

Arguments

text

Character(1). The text to scan.

types

Character vector of secret types to check. Defaults to all available types from secret_patterns(). See secret_patterns() for the full list of ~40 supported types.

Value

A named list where each element is a character vector of matches found for that secret type. Empty character vectors indicate no matches.

Examples

detect_secrets("API_KEY = 'sk_live_abc123def456ghi789jkl0'")
#> $api_key
#> [1] "API_KEY = 'sk_live_abc123def456ghi789jkl0"
#> 
#> $aws_key
#> character(0)
#> 
#> $password
#> character(0)
#> 
#> $token
#> character(0)
#> 
#> $private_key
#> character(0)
#> 
#> $github_token
#> character(0)
#> 
#> $aws_secret_key
#> character(0)
#> 
#> $gcp_api_key
#> character(0)
#> 
#> $gcp_service_account
#> character(0)
#>

detect_secrets("AKIAIOSFODNN7EXAMPLE", types = "aws_key")
#> $aws_key
#> [1] "AKIAIOSFODNN7EXAMPLE"
#>
